function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of workplace guidance for COVID-19 management","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread and illness among office workers","Mitigation":"Provide clear and updated workplace guidance for COVID-19 management","Technologies":"Communication tools, digital signage for information dissemination","People":"Office workers, facility management professionals","Owner":"Employers, facility management"}]}
